channel.title: I can't open my client
channel.description:
when i try to open the 317 client i get this screen [URL=http://s1285.photobucket.com/user/gofobe/media/client317_zps27834537.png.html][IMG]http://i1285.photobucket.com/albums/a592/gofobe/client317_zps27834537.png[/img][/URL] translation: java isen't recognized as an intern or extern command, program or batch file press any key to continue
my java is up to date so i don't know how to fix this
thx gofobe

item.title: I can't open my client
item.dc:creator: @gofobe gofobe
item.description:
@gofobe wrote:

when i try to open the 317 client i get this screen

translation:
java isen’t recognized as an intern or extern command, program or batch file
press any key to continue

my java is up to date so i don’t know how to fix this

thx
gofobe
